Headline: #94 California Temporary Reroute near California/Wellington
ShortDescription: 94 California buses temp. rerouted NB: California, Diversey, Western, Belmont, & Rockwell; SB: Rockwell, Addison, Western, Belmont, & California.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#94 California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near California/Wellington

Northbound buses will operate via California, Diversey, Western, Belmont, & Rockwell

Southbound buses will operate via Rockwell, Addison, Western, Belmont, & California.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Pink Line Service Delayed near Cicero
ShortDescription: Pink Line trains continue to stand near Cicero due to debris on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line trains continue to stand near Cicero due to debris on the tracks.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between 54th/Cermak and Central Park
ShortDescription: Pink Line service has been temporarily suspended between 54th/Cermak and Central Park due to debris on the tracks.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line service has been temporarily suspended between 54th/Cermak and Central Park due to debris on the tracks.

As a result, trains are operating only between The Elevated Loop and Central Park at this time.

Shuttle buses are available between Central Park and 54th/Cermak to provide connecting service.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
